text: tumase pahale bhee bahut-se rasool jhuthalae ja chuke hai, to ve apane jhuthalae jaane aur kasht pahunchae jaane par dhairy se kaam lete rahe, yahaan tak ki unhen hamaaree sahaayata pahunch gaee. koee nahin jo allaah kee baaton ko badal sake. tumhaare paas to rasoolon kee kuchh khabaren pahunch hee chukee hai
